extendedInfo.description: Soccer Practice Drills for U-6.Seasons worth of fun soccer drills. Mixture of new and classic soccer activities. Not sure what to practice today ? Pick from a list of drills or use the Droid "Drill Spinner". Just swipe the the "Droid Drill Spinner" and let the Droid randomly pick one of the over 30 fun soccer activities. And yes, to make it more interesting for you and your players, we had to add in a few fitness activities(Jumping Jacks, Wind Sprints, etc).
